Description: • Develop a strategy for the overall D2C platform from Fashion Industry• Leading entire category / brand / online revenue channel wrt P&L accountability• Understanding & improving consumer journey and managing website and entire revenue• Track & optimize CAC, Conversion & key performance metrics• Liaise with technology team in improving the user interface / experience wrt application• Must understand tech flow and can cross-functionally work with tech, product & performance marketing team.• Incumbent with an experience in building the D2C application and driving business.• Must hold 7-10 years of experience in managing business for apparel or D2C brandJob Details
